Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/57th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 55th, Loomis, 59th, and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 55th, Loomis, 59th, and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/57th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Washington
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Washington, Austin, Madison, and Central due to, street blockage at Central/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
